name: Stunt Bike Race Free
description:
Stunt Bike Race
If you think that bike riding and stunts are very typical tasks, it’s the time, now you can easily ride the racing bikes and can try various mind blowing stunts by using "Bike Stunt Race”, a thrilling, challenging and extremely exciting bike riding experience and one of the best stunt game. Riding a racing bike is an art, cult, passion - a thing that you do because you feel something from inside.
The highest degree of challenges are included in our game, ride your bike and become the ultimate rider and be best . The aim of game is to ride safely and quickly, make your way through each obstacle course. Be careful not to tip and crush.
Features:-
*-* Choose your Bike Rider on the basis of his stats,
*-* Unlock new Bikes
*-* All the stages are designed for fun with eye soothing graphics & animations without losing game performance.
*-* You can also unlock various stages like
*-* Easy controls, brake and acceleration using left & right half of the screen respectively.
****..
